    protected final R
    createResource(Supplier<R> constructor, WithStructureDefinition<?> profile)
    Uses the given construction supplier to create the resource, sets a resource ID, and assigns the given profile as the profile in the resource's meta-information without any version information.

    R
    createResource(Supplier<R> constructor, WithStructureDefinition<V> profile, V version)
    Uses the given construction supplier to create the resource, sets a resource ID, and assigns the given profile and version as the profile in the resource's meta-information with the given version.

  • Method Details

    • setIdTo

      protected final R setIdTo(R resource)
      Sets the resource ID to the given element.

      This method assigns either a unique, if no ID was given by the user, or the given ID to the provided resource element. The ID is generated based on the implementation of BaseBuilder.getResourceId().

      Specified by:
      setIdTo in class BaseBuilder<R extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource,B extends ResourceBuilder<R,B>>
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource to which the ID will be assigned
      Returns:
      the resource element with the assigned ID

    • createResource

      protected final R createResource(Supplier<R> constructor, WithStructureDefinition<?> profile)
      Uses the given construction supplier to create the resource, sets a resource ID, and assigns the given profile as the profile in the resource's meta-information without any version information.
      Parameters:
      constructor - the supplier to instantiate the resource object
      profile - the profile to use as the profile in the resource's meta-information
      Returns:
      the instantiated resource

    • createResource

      protected final <V extends ProfileVersion> R createResource(Supplier<R> constructor, WithStructureDefinition<V> profile, V version)
      Uses the given construction supplier to create the resource, sets a resource ID, and assigns the given profile and version as the profile in the resource's meta-information with the given version.
      Parameters:
      constructor - the supplier to instantiate the resource object
      profile - the profile to use as the profile in the resource's meta-information
      version - the version of the profile in the resource's meta-information
      Returns:
      the instantiated resource
